Key Match Events: Harmeet Singh struck the winning runs with three consecutive sixes
Corey Anderson scored an unbeaten 34* and hit a six in the final over
USA won by 5 wickets with 3 balls remaining
Pre-Game Insights: The USA won by 5 wickets (with 3 balls remaining)
The USA dominated most of the proceedings
The USA picked up their second win against a Full Member in T20Is
Post-Match Reflections: Harmeet Singh expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
The coach highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their series push
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jasdeep Singh's first over was a no-ball
